vsParam:
Here you are, Sorel...
That monster was very strong...

Sorry, I'm so sorry...
It's all my fault, sorry...

Come on.
Just return this favor to us!

OK, return... return this favor...
I got it! I'll be your reward!

I'll help [px] gather material!
How about that? A good idea?

Think about it. Both wizardry and alchemy
need various materials! So...

Let's take action separately to search for
various materials, isn't is more efficient?

I see.
[px], what do you think?
I'm glad Sorel is here with us!
I think it will get very noisy.

You bet! Hah, this idea can't be better.
So I'll stick to you!

Just call me when you need to gather material!
Nice to work with you, [px]!

What do you mean it'll get very noisy!?
It will get alive, OK?

Anyway, I'll stick to you!
Just call me when you need to gather material, [px]!
